Name: View transferred size
Description: Can I view the size of the data transferred over the network?

Chrome.Notes: 1. In the **Network** panel, the footer contains the size of the data transferred in Bytes. If a filter is applied, then it displays the size of the filtered resources followed by all the resources.

Firefox.Notes: 1. In the **Network** panel, the footer contains the size of the data transferred in Bytes. If a filter is applied, then it displays the size of the filtered resources followed by all the resources.

Edge.Notes: 1. In the **Network** panel, the footer contains the size of the data transferred in Bytes. If a filter is applied, then it displays the size of the filtered resources followed by all the resources.

Safari.Notes: 1. In the **Network** panel, the footer contains the size of the data transferred in Bytes. If a filter is applied, then it displays the size of the filtered resources.

Opera.Notes: 1. In the **Network** panel, the footer contains the size of the data transferred in Bytes. If a filter is applied, then it displays the size of the filtered resources followed by all the resources.
